reviewText: This works really well!  Highly recommend...drop Q tip into the pink solution...do not shake the bottle.  Place on blemish...the next day, blemish is smaller and less irritated...no miracle, just do this everyday and you will see results...

It doesn't pill which is a big plus for me, it feels good on the eye and moisturizes to make the eye are look less dry and the initial application makes the lines a little less noticeable but it doesn't do anything to make the lines go away or lessen and at least for me it seems I have to reapply it throughout the day or my eyes look dry and tired. I see no firming at all, it does plump a little but it is short lived and needs to be reapplied throughout the day. For the price I would expect it to do more than it does.
summary: It is OK but needs to be reapplied to keep eyes moisturized

reviewText: I have been using the Proraso shave cream with great success.  I purchased this "Soap in the Bowl" to support a recent vacation as I did not want to travel with my ceramic bowl.  This product provided a very comparable lather and since it was the same ingredients as the cream in the tube, I did not experience any break-outs as a result.  This is a must have for travel or for anyone not wanting to mess with the separates.

My wife has been using the primer for the past week now when she puts on her makeup for work. She mentioned that it makes it a bit easier to apply her makeup as it goes on smoothly after this product has been applied.

She also mentioned that she has had no issues with the product throughout her day. I had assumed maybe given it's a face product and her job involves her running about (teacher) that it wouldn't last but she assures me it does. In all she thinks it's a great product and probably will get another one once she eventually gets through it all. She says that may be awhile though as it tends to not take too much of the substance for her to get a good application.
Did not heat up well

As someone who usually uses Secret clear gel, I was not a fan of this stick deodorant, as it neither seemed to control perspiration or odor.

The initial smell is astringent and, generally, unpleasant, couple with the fact it seems to have little effect, making this a hard pass.

I'd love to use a more natural deodorant/anti-perspirant product but it also has to work to make that worthwhile.

I've used it mostly around my eyes for the last two weeks before going to bed. As another reviewer described, it has the consistency of a lotion mixed with vaseline. However, it absorbs nicely. One pump does the trick for me.

I like the fact that it has no added fragrance. That does not mean there is no smell, but it is very mild. Additionally, since companies do not have to disclose what is in their fragrances, those products that do have fragrances often contain toxins.

This restorative serum has reduced my wrinkles and the puffiness under my eyes but at 69 it hasn't given me the skin of a 30 year old. There is no miracle serum that I know of but this helps. It goes on with a little tingle that soon goes away.

i could do without the bottle. If it were my product, I'd put it in plain brown glass and pass on the savings... but maybe the pump is more fun.

This is a tiny pump container of sunscreen. It sells on Amazon for a crazy high price (to me) and I was curious to see what the big deal was. The pump dispenses a thin stream of lotion which has a light citrus fragrance which is completely overrun by sunscreen scent. On me it really lingered. I could never wear this on my face.

The up side is how great this feels on my skin. It is like velvet, no greasy slick or sticky mess. I put it on my arms and the skin actually looked better, more hydrated and smooth. Unfortunately the sunscreen-y smell overwhelmed me. I can get that for a couple dollars at Walgreens.

The container I got has a 7 month lead in to expiration which I think is fair for a price-dense ingredient product. It will be super easy to use this up in a week so 7 months will be no challenge. I just can't see spending this much on a teeny bit of sunscreen so this will be my first and last container.
summary: Feels lovely on my skin but same old sunscreen smell

reviewText:
This lip balm is creamy and smooth.  It glides easily onto your lips.  The Berries shade is very, very dark.  Even though this is a lip balm, it covers like a lipstick.  You can use your finger, or a lip brush.  Because this is so dark, I would suggest using a brush to apply it.

If you are looking for a nice, creamy lip balm that works like a lipstick, give this one a try.

So I love essie and the color was rich and beautiful, though the picture is not really what it looks like in person. The color is more of a pink, then light coral. It took almost three weeks to be delivered.
summary: Beautiful color but took FOREVER TO come!

reviewText: It was the size I needed, heats up fast and gives long hair full wavy curls. Good value for the price. My naturally straight hair does not hold the curl for very long but this tool does what is expected and is easy to use. I also like that it is gold in color!

I've been using this dryer for a couple weeks and I feel good about my purchase. I'm not seeing dramatic frizz reduction or anything but it does seem to have helped  a bit with my flyaway prone hair. I can definitely say that it is faster than my old dryer, and I'm amazed at how quiet it is!  I wish it was a bit smaller as it is sort of hard to store but other than that I am very happy.
summary: Dries fast and seems to reduce frizz

style: {'Color:': ' 70W Mocha: For deep skin with warm undertones'}
reviewText:
This is not my favorite powder. First, the both of the colors are really quite orange, so unless your skin is on the Oompa Loompa spectrum, it might not be great. But, and this sort of contradicts what is says about "medium to full coverage", it is relatively sheer, so when you put it on, it looks like a light spray tan (yes, the orange kind, but not in a terrible way, just in a kind of unnatural way).

If you are in the heat or sweating, you can also expect it to look patchy if used alone. Some parts will look shiny, some won't. Some will keep the color, some will kind of soak into your pores, making your face feel like it's suffocating a little. I was outdoors for not very long but in Florida heat, and it should have done better for fewer than 10 minutes. I would strongly hesitate using it for all-day wear or for performing (I'm a dancer, so I need makeup that holds).

In short:
-coverage is semi-sheer to medium, not full (unless you apply some sort of base)
-color is quite orange tinted
-feels heavy on skin and in pores

Not the worst, not the best. I wouldn't recommend it when others cost less and are better.
summary: feels heavy, doesn't do well in heat, looks orange

reviewText: I'm pretty happy about the LumaRx facial cleansing brush. It is designed very ergonomically and is very comfortable to hold during use. The tool is extremely lightweight and has a tapered design which makes it so comfortable to use. The instructions are to use it for a minute each morning and evening. It has illustrations which show you to spend 20 seconds on the right side and 20 seconds on the left side and 20 seconds on the T-zone. The tool will actually buzz gently when you should move to the next area. This is a great feature! It also comes with 3 brush heads; massage, sensitive and normal skin. I am using the sensitive for now and it is perfect for a gentle exfoliation. When I am finished with that minute, my skin just glows and feels so clean! Hopefully the heads do not need replaced quickly as I do not think they are yet available on Amazon or online. It also comes with a sleek charger that does not take up any room at all on the counter  this is important to me as I have a small bathroom. Also, the LumaRx comes with a very nice carrying case that will come in handy for an upcoming vacation.
summary: Exciting product for smooth and glowing skin

reviewText: Really awesome lotion! I ordered it after reading it would help soothe facial skin after using too much acne medication (seriously dry spots), without causing new blemishes...and it's true. I always overuse, have dry spots, then get new acne from the moisturizer I try to use, but this didn't make me break out anew. It's got a great feel to it and soaks right into your skin. Very safe for your face!
As an adult I use this myself. It is wonderful in the shower or as a hand soap in my kitchen. No scent and not at all irritating. I use their lotion too and it is wonderful!!!

I have looked all over for the glove and can't find it. I checked inside the packaging twice. Is there a secret compartment on the handle that holds the glove that I can't find? Meanwhile, I don't see why they could not have put a few spikes on this to hold the hair in place rather than make you wear a glove and then change the glove hand to do the other side of your head. That's a lot of work. But I can see this is how all the female commentators on Fox News end up with those spirals of hair on their shoulders. I am concerned that none of the other reviews say theirs came without a glove.

This is very expensive for what it does. Couldn't you just twist a regular curling iron around the ends of your hair?

Meanwhile, if it touches your face -- and that's not hard to do when you are trying to twist the hair on the side of your head around it -- you burn your face. A few spikes would have served as a buffer between your skin and the hot rod.

First, the color shown here, which looks like a soft apricot, was actually a garish orange: my toes look like I am wearing orange peel! Second, as another reviewer mentioned, the polish goes on streaky, and it was only after much effort, and much time, that I was able to achieve some semblance of coverage.  I have never thrown out a polish, but this one I did. I think I will stick to Opi polishes, they have a better quality overall.  As for this Essie polish: COMPLETE FAIL, I hated it!!
summary: Absolutely the worse nail polish I have ever used!!

reviewText: Great moisturizer that keep skin soft and hydrated. Doesn't evaporate overtime. Smells good and a little goes long way. Great ingredients too.

My first impression of this lipstick is the ornate case! It's resembles gray marble with the Oribe logo. I use red lipstick all the time and I'm fairly picky about the color of red. This one looks like an orange red in the tube, but when applied it has a pink red hue It resembles one of my favorite lipsticks, MAC in the color Ladybug. It's easy to apply and stays on fairly well. I didn't notice any plumping to make lips fuller, which is fine since I don't really need that for my lips. It has a nice sheen to it too.

I have really enjoyed testing out these Obagi beauty products (I am a wash and lotion guy). This Hydrate Luxe is a winner, it made my skin feel very smooth and it has a nice gentle smell. Very easy to apply and goes on easily, it doesn't feel heavy at all. If you are fancy and have the budget to spend for this luxurious moisturizer, this is a great choice, oh yeah, the wife likes it too!

I have been using a pancake type makeup finish and didn't realize how much better a loose setting powder is until I tried this. My makeup looks so much more fresh, and less "cakey". This powder keeps my makeup looking fresh till afternoon, and then I apply it again to freshen up. I really love it, and will keep using it from now on.

style: {'Color:': ' 10N Cream: For fair skin with neutral undertones'}
reviewText:
For whatever reason, the current formulations of Dermablend products don't seem to do what Dermabelend formulations of the past have done. They are still good but not as effective as previous incarnations.

This one is pretty good, overall, though, and it can be used as either a base to cover imperfections first before applying foundation. I thought it would be too heavy for that but it does work. On its own, it may not provide the full coverage for bad scars or other issues but on me, it did a nice job of calming down the look of redness I get after working out. I can work out, shower and apply this without added foundation on top of it and go to work without looking like a full-on tomato.

It blends well and the shade was light enough for my pale skin. Its still a good option for minimizing common skin issues but it won't cover everything.
summary: Not as good as it used to be, but still pretty good, overall

reviewText: Awesome fall color!!!!

I have been using this brand for a year now and my teeth are whiter. It is pricy. I prefer the cinnamon flavor. I have tried colgate and other name brands but they didn't whiten my teeth, even though they promised to do so.
love it

OMG, received so many wonderful samples in this box.  Loved trying things I had never used before.  Then the neatest thing - when I order so Vichy Night Mask, they took the cost of this box off the product.  The product I order was not even in the box - however it  Vichy is considered a Luxury Item.  Try it. There was even some men cologne samples, my grandson loved.

I love green but this green is nothing special. Its like a black base with green sparkles. I thought it would be more green. It's just very blah.
I love the vinylux polishes. They last much longer than the regular polish and are much easier to take off. This color stayed on very well for 7 days. Sometimes the polish will wear at the tips and very rarely have a small chip at the tips but usually by that time I am ready to change the color anyway.
All in all, very happy with purchase. No complaints.
summary: Love vinylux poishes not crazy about color

reviewText: Pretty color
It's a pretty color if you have the time and patience to apply 3-4 coats. Even after 3 coats you could still see my nail line.

style: {'Style:': ' Trinity Facial Trainer Set +  Eye & Lip Enhancer'}
reviewText:
As noted, I'm still evaluating this item and I suspect that long-term use will reveal its benefits, or lack thereof.  So far, I haven't noticed huge differences, but I did feel that my brows looked a bit lifted immediately after use.  It also seemed to tighten up the area under my jawline.  I'm talking about incremental improvement, but it does seem to help.

I also used aloe vera gel in addition to the supplied gel, so perhaps that could save you money once you run out of the NuFace provided product.  One does sometimes feel a mild tingling sensation, but hey it's electrical micro-current.  But it's not painful or especially unpleasant.

I'm going to try to continue to use this device daily and may upgrade, downgrade or add to this review depending on my future experience.  But 4 stars for now, as it does seem to offer some level of improvement.
summary: Still evaluating.  Seems to be some benefit.

reviewText: This definitely is a sage color.  I have many clothes that are sage, so this polish matches perfectly.  Be sure to use the top coat and it will last a minimum of week or more.  Glad I found vinylux because I love having a lasting polish that looks good from the time you put on till the time you take it off.
summary: Green polish with a hint of blue

reviewText: Jouer Mattifying Powder Bronzer is a wonderful easy wonderful quality bronzer you almost get addicted to. Its sleek, soft, and packaged well for running around with. I love this product. I even use this instead of face powder at times to just hit the main spots that need a bit of healthy glow and simply keep going.
Slightly more orangey than in the picture, but bright an  pretty nonetheless.
really makes your teeth feel clean!

I got these, and carted them off to the gym to try them post-workout.  They were certainly good enough; my hair is definitely shinier.  But, because it takes a lot of product to shampoo and condition thicker hair, the trial sizes won't go far.  I won't be able to eke more than a second shampoo and conditioner application out of them.  I've found that I generally need more than that to do a sound assessment of shampoo:  allergies and sensitivities often don't show up--or recede--until I have used the product for more than ten days.  That's obviously not an option here.  Would I go out and buy the full-sized products just to be able to test the shampoo (etc) adequately?  Maybe, when the product is inexpensive.  This isn't.
summary: Good enough: my hair IS shinier. But: Those with thick hair probably won't get more than 2 shampoos from trial size product.

reviewText:
who thinks this is a silly product?  I ordered this through vine, because for one thing  it didn't cost me anything and yes, I was curious enough.  But honestly, I didn't feel (or look) any more radiant, toned or hydrated. The only things I felt were silly for spritzing my face and neck with this slightly sticky feeling, citrus smelling water and grateful that I didn't spend any money on it.

Would I recommend?  NO.
I saw this color on Pinterst and had to have it.  Much to my excitement, the bottle was much less expensive then in the store and arrived quickly.  I've worn already and it lasts on my nails great.

I chose this product because my son is currently staying with me and has a thick full beard. I thought it might be something he would like and use. But he didn't care for it. He didn't care for the smell or how it made his beard feel. Scented things are a matter of preference, and it seems a lot of people are liking the scent. I smelled it and it has sort of a lemon Lysol smell to me.
summary: My son did not care for it

reviewText: I hate putting sunscreen on my face because it feels greasy, and looks shiny. Not the Vichy Capital Soleil. It spreads easily, absorbs into my skin quickly, and leaves a matte finish that feels soft without feeling greasy. This lotion is fragrance free, but not totally unscented. It has a very slight scent that is barely noticeable, and not disagreeable. I've used it several times, and have had no reaction at all. No redness, flaking, itching, burning, or rash. Capital Soleil 60 is now my go to for facial sunscreen lotion.

To be honest I am not a big fan of using hand cream and even any type of lotion. Because I don't like the oily feeling. This AHAVA hand cream totally changes my view. The cream is thick but easy to apply. Only couple pea size of cream is able to cover the hands well. The best part is you can feel a nice and thick cover on your hands but it gets absorbed very quickly so there is no such oily touch. Usually I only use hand cream in the very dry days but with this I have no problem using it every day. Also the smell is really good, not intensive just a light and elegant smell. Highly recommended.
summary: Absorb quickly, smells great and no oily feel

reviewText: I love CND Vinylux - works as promised.  Does not damage my nails like gel does.  Easy to apply and fast drying.
amazing color, get a lot of compliments because of it!
Love the smell.  Seems to be easier on the nails.
I love this product
The BEST nail polish!
It's nail polish.  It was unopened, it was the color I wanted, and it arrived relatively quickly.  What more can I say?
this really helps!
I was surprised this was not greasy at all and soaked in really well. Going to buy the full size!
I ordered one color and they sent me a different one. Luckily I liked the color they sent me but it just wasn't the one I ordered. It came on time thought

Nowhere does it say these are matte lipsticks!  I always go to the mfr website if I plan to buy lipstick online; I find that comparing the color swatches from 2 or more sites helps me get a better visual idea of what the actual in-person color is.  LORAC's website clearly states these are opaque, matte lipsticks...information that is not given on the Amazon site anywhere that I can find.

Also, comparing department store photos to LORAC photos to Amazon photos makes them all look wildly different.  I will stick with Armani for my mattes and look elsewhere for moisturizing lipstick.

NUXE CONTOUR DES YEUX PRODIGIEUX ANTI-FATIGUE MOISTURIZING EYE CREAM, 0.5 FL. OZ. goes on light and smooth. I was surprised at how tiny the container is, yet equally surprised at how little you need. The fragrance is pleasant. It appears to reduce puffiness. Though I do notice a difference, its subtle. I believe it is equal to other products of the same quality.

Product Description:

This moisturizing, re-energizing skincare for the eye contour has a double action: anti-aging and anti-puffiness. It is light, non-greasy, and suitable for sensitive eyes as well as contact lens wearers.

We were wondering if this tinted sunscreen would be too tinted and show up on the skin; it doesn't at all!  It's good sunscreen - it's not oily and it doesn't smell bad.  Anyway, we're glad we have it and will for sure use it all!
Great color
it's as described a dark grey..looks nice in the light because of the light shimmer it has. two coats does the trick not a thick formula
Gave it as a gift they love it -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- -- --

BURBERRY Brit for Women Eau de Toilette, 3.3 fl. Oz

This is a lovely scent for the lady in your life. It being an eau de toilette, it is not over-powering, for you. It has floral and citrus notes and a touch of vanilla. It is beautifully packaged for gift giving. The bottle with the gray white and red striping is quite elegant. I like it very much and am quite pleased with the effect. It is joyous to say the least. I know you will enjoy the effect. If you have any doubt try a smaller size first but I think you will be pleased.
Great eyeliner.  It's easy and soft to apply.  It looks good and stays on all day.  It's not really waterproof, run a bit.  Overall, I like it.
Product was as expected :-)

Being ridiculously pale I do not naturally tan, the closest I get is when I freckle a whole bunch and they almost touch. So, I'm no stranger to self tanner, I've tried many types of the years just to put a touch of color to my legs that seem to always being paler than my arms. During application the color of this product is a bit off putting but thankfully there is no swampy green color left on the skin after rinsing. I did it in my usual way, exfoliate thoroughly then apply with a mitt. I did feel like I was getting better coverage and liked the consistency more than my previous favorite which was lotion style. I left it on just shy of an hour and was pleased that it was light and even. It is on the pricey side but honestly I've yet to find an inexpensive self tanner that doesnt turn me some shade of orange so I feel it is worth the extra cost. Overall this is a great self tanner with even coverage and a nice resulting tan color. I did not test to see how dark I could get it as that's too much of a jump from my natural pale but I feel comfortable recommending it for a light natural looking tan.
it's actually the color for my wedding so i'm a bit biased, but this looks amazing and essie is a fantastic brand.

I've written reviews for this before, so maybe I shouldn't even bother to write again about this product. But once again, I will say that people stop me and ask me what products I use on my skin, so I must be doing something right. And this is what I tell them I use. I really think it makes all the difference.

This is the standout of the Baxter skin care line. I've tried a number of moisturizers, from drug store to specialty items, and this is one of the best. There is no greasy feel, and it sinks into the skin quickly. My skin feels softer for having used it.

It's also quite effective, so you don't need a lot to feel like you're covering all the skin you need.

While the other Baxter skin care products are (in my opinion) overpriced, this moisturizer is absolutely worthy of the price.
summary: Wonderful product - moisturizes well without feeling greasy

reviewText:
Personally, I wasn't a fan of this perfume. It was kind of flowery and reminded me of cheap perfume you'd pick up at a discount store. My daughter who is 16, however, immediately disappeared with it and seems to like it.

She also loved the bottle and, I agree, it's very pretty and unique.

So, in my house there's one thumbs up and one thumbs down.
summary: Not my style, but my daughter loves it.

reviewText: I love the consistency and fragrance of this primer.  You only need a small, pea sized amount for your whole face.  Makeup goes on and stays on better using this product.  Even though it costs more than other brands, it is well worth it and it's a large bottle that will last months.
summary: I love the consistency and fragrance of this primer

reviewText: If I could give this 10 stars, I would. I've had problem skin since I was a kid. Even though it's under control, I still have large pores. Yes, I use all kinds of primers and foundations that will minimize them, but this product actually made my pores appear to be way more reduced than anything I've used before. Fantastic! Buy it!!
summary: Could I call this a "miracle" product? I think so!

reviewText: Best hairspray on the market. And not to mention the best smelling
Great summer color!  May be discontinued, but the bottle seemed fresh and has held up well...
Good product.

style: {'Color:': ' 10N Cream: For fair skin with neutral undertones'}
reviewText: The Dermablend Smooth Liquid Camo Medium Coverage Foundation has been working very well for my wife.  It provides excellent coverage without adding additional oiliness to her already oily skin.  The color cream is a good match for my light to medium color complexion.  The foundation includes SPF 25 which is a necessity for her since we live in sunny Southern California.  Since the coverage is better than the products she has used in the past she needed to use less product to avoid settling in pores and avoiding a heavy look.  She likes her makeup to look natural and she achieves that goal by smoothing the product around her face and using a small amount of foundation.  Her skin would definitely look too oily if she used more foundation and did not smooth it evenly around her face.  It seemed to last throughout the day despite her oily skin.  She would definitely recommend this product to anyone looking for good coverage with sufficient sun protection.
Great shampoo that leaves hair clean and shiny.
summary: Wonderful shampoo that makes your scalp and hair feel good.

reviewText:
I like the scent, it smells refreshing - slightly citrusy and herbal, maybe lemon verbena. The scent is a little masculine, but I'm female and I like it too. I also like that the smell doesn't linger; smells nice while you're in the shower, but it won't compete with your perfume/cologne.

The bar is pretty big and it is rectangular, not contoured like other brands. It barely fits in my soap dish and is a little hard to hold.
Especially since it feels more slippery than other soaps (I think because of the clay).
But it lathers pretty well and rinses clean.

style: {'Color:': ' 75W Golden Brown: For deep skin with warm undertones'}
reviewText: This is a decent foundation type creme.  It did blend well and the color is exactly as pictured.  It is smooth and works as a good compliment to my foundation and powder of the similar color.  I have pretty sensitive skin within about 3 hours of putting this on, I could feel a bit of an itch, and by the time I washed it off, I had red, splotchy marks everywhere I'd applied it.  I waited a few days, until the redness had cleared and tried again, with just the creme, no foundation or powder, just to make sure it wasn't the combination that caused the irritation.  It wasn't it was the creme, same thing happened again.  So, overall, if you have sensitive skin, you may want to skip this one, if you don't this is a great product, as it covers/blends well.
summary: Wasn't great for my sensitive skin...

reviewText: Smells lovely, very moisturizing, non irritating, and wears well under makeup or alone! Good stuff!! And a little goes a long way!
I am very happy with the quality of the polish and the color is simply beautiful on my tanned feet.
This is a great product.  It has kept my skin smooth and acne free for almost two years now.
summary: This is a great product. It has kept my skin smooth and ...

reviewText:
after I used it 3 weeks my skin has no improvement still dry
I don't think this product make a difference

This review is for the iS Clinical Cleansing Complex. (Sometimes reviews end up under the wrong product.)

I was surprised how much I like this. You really do only need a small amount - just a pea-sized drop- and just use that to clean your entire face and neck. It's great because unlike many cleansing creams and soaps, you don't have to put it on with a pad or sponge; just use your fingers and add water.

So it really does work well as a cleanser and also it is a makeup remover. It's also advertised to work as a toner as well. In fact, they recommend leaving it on your face for 5 minutes before you wash it off.

The first time I did that, the next morning I found that bits of the skin on my face sloughed off - but not in a severe way like it did when I tried using a retinol cream. Instead this sloughing was barely noticible (more I could feel it) and I just rinsed my face and it felt so much cleaner and softer. Loved it.

I have tried and used many facial cleaners and aging creams from cheaply priced to very expensive, and have to say this is my favorite cleanser. It is on the expensive side, but you really don't need to use very much - just that pea-sized drop.

The best recommendation I can make is that I plan to order this again as soon as I run out.
summary: Really like this; will continue to buy this and use on my own

reviewText:
I did not like this face wash and was pretty disappointed because I am a huge La Roche-Posay fan. Their other products have really impressed me but this face wash burned my eyes so badly  even without getting it directly in them, just in the normal course of washing my face.  It also left my skin really really clean which may sound great but I couldn't help but feel it was stripping my skin of every single bit of moisture.  I swear my skin would make a squeaking noise when I rubbed my finger over it after using this.

So, no thank you, I would like to keep my moisture barrier.

Note:  I also tried the Purifying Foaming Cream Cleanser and it felt exactly the same.
summary: I did not like this face wash and was pretty disappointed because I ...

reviewText: I received a sample as a gift and I've been buying this Creme ever since.  My skin feels and looks amazing (43 years old), and given that I have sensitive skin and it has never caused a blemish, I highly recommend it. I use it every morning along with the Nuxe Dry Oil. The scent is lovely. I've been using this now for two years.
Excellent

I love Laura Geller products - I had previously used a different spackle from her but I am really enjoying this oil control primer during times of the month when my face is a little greasier.  This provides a smooth foundation before putting on my balance and brighten also from Laura Geller.  This helps to make more pores look a little smaller and really helps control shine.  I like the feel of it on my face as well.
summary: I love Laura Geller products - I had previously used a ...

reviewText: I liked this face wash. It was interesting and definitely foamed quite nicely. I didn't notice anything too different in my skin, but my wife tried it and declared that it was one of the better cleansers she's used in a while.

First of all...I don't have skin problems but I do have really dry skin...especially in the winter months.  This hand cream soothed my dryness with its first application.  What I also love about it is that it is not thick or greasy.  Lots of lotions are very oily and it takes a while to get rid of that oily residue.  This just left my hands soft and smooth without any heavy residue.  Would I buy this?  I think I might.  I love products with Ahava.  I love the feeling my hands have...soft and smooth without a slippery feel!
summary: What I also love about it is that it is not thick or ...

reviewText: I've used this on both my face and hands. It has not been long enough to know what the long term benefits may or may not be. It has a soft, rose scent, which I like. The serum goes on smoothly and doesn't leave a greasy residue behind. It softens beautifully and I think my skin looks brighter.
summary: which I like. The serum goes on smoothly and doesn't leave ...

reviewText: A bit refreshing, but I'd prefer similar scents with less chemicals. With over 20 aftershave creams, balms, and splashes now, this one just doesn't stand out.
Smells good, works great on hair. I didn't like it on my face though. I need a natural Rose toner, this isn't natural.
I SO Loved it!!! The Color is Just to Die for! <3

Perfumes are hard to review since everyone's preferences are different.  I am sure everyone has sat next to someone with an overpowering perfume and thought "too much".  I don't think anyone will find this overpowering, but it is a very sweet scent.  This product does have lasting power.  I put some on in the morning, and could still notice it when I went to be and laid my arm near my face.  It is not my favorite, but since everyone's body chemistry is different you may love it.

I only used it one time, read the instructions AFTER I put it on. Instructions said to expect skin irritation and peeling and to only use a couple of times a week to start until your skin got used to it. Since I'm not super unhappy with my skin, I'd rather hold off using this product until I am instead of dealing with skin irritation and peeling now.
summary: Since I'm not super unhappy with my skin

reviewText:
I wear a lot of lipstick and am very particular about  brands. I do find that some really dry my lips out and I don't care for that.  This lipstick was hydrating and went on smoothly.

The color I received, Whitney was a little pinker then I usually purchase but it was very pretty. I tend to layer my lipsticks and will use this one for sure. I'm planning on trying some of the other colors too. Very nice and recommended.

My sister-in-law turned me on to Bioelements and I have been using their products for over 10 years.  I love the Flash Foam as I feel it really cleans my face very well.  I use a wash cloth with it.  It seems as though it lasts a very long time.
summary: Face feels CLEAN after using this

reviewText: PERFECT TAN

I purchased these (26) to give as a thank you for my baby shower. They have not been given yet but if it is anything like any other Essie product it will be well recieved. This was the best price for Essie without going to some unknown website that sold imatation items. I look forward to sharing these with my guests. We are very excited that the pink with the sparkles will represent our daughter!

It's hard to measure how well a product like this works, unless you only use it on half your face (which I did not do).  However, I feel a tingling sensation when I apply it to my skin, which gives me the feeling it is working.  Also, it does seem like my skin around my eyes (which tends to show age the most) is a little more smooth since I've starting using this product a few weeks ago.  I also use other skin care products and a regime, so I cannot say 100% it's a result of this product, or it isn't something my mind wants to see, so does.  I really like that there is a little pump that seems to dispense just the right amount.  I see from previous reviews it used to just be a squeeze tube that tended to burst, so I am glad I got one of these improved packages.  I'll update if I see any more results, but for now, it seems to be working well.
summary: Tingling feelings suggests it's working; pump dispenses right amount

reviewText: You can't argue with the price or the options for these. I see this pretty frequently in salons, so decided to give it a go. I was looking for bigger curls/waves. I ended up returning the first one I received because it did not heat up. My replacement seems better, though it still doesn't seem to get as hot as it says it will. Overall it does curls pretty well. My hair is straight and fine and really resists being curled, so using this they often fall out. The construction is good, though the temperature knob feels a little flimsy.  I haven't found anything better for the type of curls I want with this curling iron (or the price), but I feel my T3 wand does a better job of producing curls that stay.

style: {'Style:': ' NuFACE mini Facial Toning Device Set'}
reviewText: This product does work, though the results are incremental and will vary from person to person.  Its not a surgical facelift, its more of a gentle toning.  Also, people react to the electrical current differently, thus its best you try it out keeping an eye of the return window.  This mini size is very convenient for travel.  Just go into it not setting your expectations too high, its akin to a face work out, not a facelift.

These come in a cute box that does warn not to use these on thin skin, irritated, or sensitive skin.  I had put a streak on my leg with some self-tanner to test this with, right on the front of my shin, and it came off quickly without a lot of rubbing at all. It left the sponge looking like it had just a bit of makeup on it.  I just wet the area that I was going to use, and rubbed it up and down about twice and the streak was gone.  My skin is ok- my skin is normally pretty good though and doesn't get irritated easily.
However, these really are just small, decorative melamine sponges and they won't last for long if they are used a lot.  They are a good quality, supple melamine at least.  They really are quite abrasive and I've no doubt this is working by taking the top layer of skin off.  The potential to damage skin is definitely there if one is not careful.

It leaves me feeling a bit ambivalent about this product.  It does work, but there are less expensive melamine sponges, and it should be used with a lot of care not to abrade the skin too much.
summary: It did work for me, but I feel ambivalent about the value & safety of these sponges

reviewText: Instead of my having to use 2 products, actually 3 sometimes, I am trying this.  I've heard of the company but have never tried anything of theirs.  This is a light feeling cleanser that you can use to wipe away your eye make up too.  Says usable for eye area and sensitive skin.  Lastly, includes a toner..there is no rinsing required.  Apply with cottonball.  From what I can decipher from ingredients, besides the Vichy natural"spa" water..there is shea butter, liquid parafin, liquid cocoa something.  This really does feel soothing and my face has not broken out.  The biggest surprise for me is that there is perfume fragrance to this..is that a little weird or just my thought?  To me it smells kind of like Eternity!  I mean, love the smell but wow, surprised me that perfume is an ingredient.

This has a light, pleasant scent that is perfect for applying right out of the shower, and the scent lasts for quite a while. My son really likes the scent and the large bottle size makes it a good value for the price.
summary: Nice manly smell, but not too heavy

reviewText: Cleared my sons skin in about a week, without drying. Time will tell if this remains effective which has been a problem with other products. Face feels clean and smooth after use.
very pretty color

I've been mostly pleased with all Shellac polishes applied with 2 coats, but this Vexed Violet, as pretty and shimmering as it is, is still somewhat sheer. I recommend applying 3 coats if you desire that opaque colour.

OK IF YOU HATE SHAVING?!?! Get this , then go to YouTube look up how to use shaving soap. Watch several videos. Then break out your soap/cream and play around with it practice and then give it a try! If you do not find this to be thee best shave ever keep practicing cause your missing a step or have not gotten it down yet.

I hated shaving! My skin always got irritated and burned after! Then I tried this stuff after watching hours of videos, I broke down and gave it a whack. Now mind you I'm in a wheel chair so it is harder for me to shave and I get worn out in my chair quickly!!!! After using this I look forward to shaving I can't wait for the stubble at 5pm or 5am to show up cause I'm going to shave... I will spend the extra 10 min to get outta  bed to go through the procedure to shave ! My skin comes out so smooth and irritation free!!!!!! And the girlfriend really noticed a difference! Spend the money, spend the time to learn , spend the time to treat your self to something fun and comforting !!!

I have used this Jane Iredale product now for 6 years.  Once introduced to it I fell in love with the appearance it gives your skin.  Does not flake or look drying on the skin.  Use with the stamping brush (bought separately) and stipple it onto your face with this brush.  It leaves no residue and makes your skin look like porcelain.  Just make sure you get the right color shade for your skin.  I am fair skin and this works great.

This polish is hard to get despite its popularity for the last 3/4 years. That is why a purchase two bottles in case this color will be discontinue (which I hope not). Its the real Essie polish. No problems with the delivery and the package was secure. Amazon did it once again.
summary: The Real Power Clutch Nail Polish

reviewText: Our older son has extremely sensitive skin and is prone to Eczema.  After several skin related infections due to over dryness, our pediatrician recommended the Mustela line of bath and skin products.  They are amazing.  We put on this lotion after a bath (where we use the bath oil).  It keeps his skin hydrated without creating a giant fight.  We've tried other lotions that either leave a residue, which my son hates.  This has a light, scent and feel only, which helps in dealing with finicky little boys (or girls) and doesn't leave his skin feeling anything but smooth. It also hydrates more than some much thicker creams we've tried.  If you or our child are prone to dry skin, this is a great solution.

I really like the color of this gloss. I got yummy mummy. It is such a pretty shade of nude. Looks way different on the lips than in the bottle. Will probably look good on all skin tones. The gloss tastes like fruit. I like it. But I don't know if everyone will.
Excellent product for edfoliation

It's summer, so what better time to take a chance on a new deodorant?  The scent on this one is like baby powder multiplied.  I can be pretty sensitive to smells.  Strong scents especially perfumes or strong chemicals  are one of the few known triggers for my migraines and this one is bordering on trouble for me.  I didn't actually get a full on migraine but it did make a little nauseous and fearful for about the first hour after I applied it because it stayed really strong that long.

Because of the heat I did use it on a low activity day and it was fine for that.  But once I added in  a little exercise (walking and the simply fit board -- so nothing too demanding) I did start to smell hints of sweat mixed with baby powder.

I would only recommend this for people who either already don't sweat much or those who really like the baby powder scent or for really low activity days.  It's just not strong enough for the kinds of days where you really need protection and the protection is does offer is more of a masking of the sweat with an overpowering scent.
Online this looked ok but in real life it is awful. Most colors are pretty true to form from the website but this one was awful.
Awesome product. fast shipping. Thank you!!!
summary: Awesome product. fast shipping. Thank you!!!

reviewText: The color was a lot darker than I had expected. It reminds me of Sally Hasen's Brick Wall, which I already have.
summary: The color wasn't really what I expected, but still pretty.

reviewText: I rarely get zits... But when I do they come in pairs lol this is a pimple destroyer ! Gets rid of it ... Probably I would say in 3 days . This helps me not pop them

You don't need much of this for your skin to feel moisturized and fresh. Not greasy feeling at all. I used it daily on my face after my shower. As with most of the Mario Badescu products I use, this is a winner. Will definitely keep using.

I've used these capsules for a month now and am overwhelmingly disappointed with the results.

The capsules are filled with thick, clogging oils that smell a bit off. I've noticed no results from the product except its unmatched ability to clog my pores.

Absolutely advise against using this if you have combination skin. I feel Elemis is heavily marketing this product because its unqiue and can generate high profits due to its absurd price. Consider purchasing natural flower/herbal oils instead. I do not trust these reviews posted and suspect a marketing campaign behind it.
This mascara is difficult to apply and remove
summary: Not as black as I wanted.

reviewText: My skin is very sensitive and this works well without irritating it. I am mainly using it on my face and it also does not irritate my eyes. It blends in better than some other products I have tried, more like a zinc-free lotion does. I have unknowingly walked around with big white patches on my face, so I really appreciate that this factor. I don't know if it works any better than cheaper (but still expensive) sensitive skin lotions I have tried, but I like it. I think I will stick to my other stuff because of this one's price.
summary: Working well on my sensitive face, but too expensive

reviewText:
This correcting cream is very smooth and silky and it absorbs without feeling greasy or heavy.  I love the way that it feels on my face and it is even very good under makeup.  I haven't noticed any change in facial lines yet, but my skin does feel good and my skin is more moist.  That helps me a lot at this time of year when everything dries out.

Now, for the down side.  I do not intend to offend anyone, but this smells like some sort of '80s kind of perfume that older women seemed to prefer.  I can't really describe it.  It just takes me back to my childhood and what the older women in church smelled like.  I don't normally buy anything with a pronounced fragrance for my face.  I don't mind a slight smell, but with this being applied to the face with such a strong scent, you can't avoid smelling it.  I love the way that it has made my skin feel.  If they came out with a fragrance free version, I would like it much better.

If you have very sensitive skin, pass this product by. I'm 52-years-old and this tanning cream caused my face to break out in acne.

I have an auto-immune disease that prevents me from being able to spend much time in the sun without covering up. I am as white as white can be, so I thought I would try this to give myself a little color. It does work. It gave me color, but after a day or two it leaned towards the orange side on me and I don't particularly want to look like Donald Trump. Luckily, I was able to wash most of it off by washing my face several times and then moisturizing.

If you don't have sensitive skin, and if, like Trump, you don't mind having a face that is orange, then this is for you. If not, embrace your whiteness as I plan to do.
summary: Not good for very sensitive skin.

reviewText: This product has a pleasant, authentic jasmine scent. It smells medium-strong upon application but after about an hour, I can barely smell it at all. It is moisturizing without being too oily and it instantly absorbed into my skin. I usually avoid butters because they can leave a sticky texture on my skin. Not so with this product. It's not quite heavy enough for use on rough elbows and heels, but that's not really an issue for me since I use BHA products on those body parts. Overall, it's a very nice light balm with an amazing scent. I'm pretty sure it's not worth $29 (I'd be happier if it was in the $15 range), but it is a nice product and would make a great gift for people who love jasmine.
summary: Very nice everyday body moisturizer, but not sure it is worth the cost

reviewText: Nice vibrant color! A beautfully deep blue. I love the quality of Essie and how long it lasts. Worth ever penny!!

5 stars given.  Beautiful coverage ..  light and airy ..  uses very little for a complete coverage.  Coverage takes care of different tones.  Evens out readiness dark spots.  I wear little heavy foundation...at times a tinted moisturizer..but have enjoyed applying this teint in the morning....it stays put ...even during a full day....even gardening.  I can honestly recommend this mousse .. especially for my mature skin.

Unexpectedly the best of my purchases.  I went on a foundation binge awhile back.  Started with Smashbox Halo and thought it was good.  Tried Estee Lauder, the light and heavier versions, Philosophy Hope in a jar version, Miracle Skin, Tarte.....I was really never thrilled with any of them.  Mostly they were too thick, heavy feeling, or I felt they were the wrong color even though a sales person "matched" me.  I had to buy some foundation when I went on a trip and grabbed this on at a drug store.  I was amazed right away how smooth and light it went on, but still covers up unevenness without making your face look like a pancake.  And by golly, it was one of the cheapest purchases.  I have since thrown away, what a waste, some of the expensive full bottles of foundation because after trying them several times, I hated the way they looked.  The Balm is the only one that is almost empty and will get replaced.  Even though it has moisturizer in it, I will still sometimes put a tiny drop of moisturizer in it and mix it up before applying with a makeup brush.  Love this stuff.  Bye bye expensive stuff.
summary: Prefer The Balm much more over Smashbox, Estee Lauder, Hope in  Jar, Miracle Skin....the Balm is the bomb!

reviewText: love the smell of it and how it leaves the nails.. thumbs up

A friend and I saw this polish on Pinterest but couldn't find it anywhere.  We were so happy to see it on Amazon.  It is an awesome neutral color for any time during the year, as well as any occasion.  You can top with a touch of sparkle for a fancier event!
I used thus according to instructions and the Polish came right off. My regular polish with vase and top coat stays on longer.
Another beautiful dark red burgundy color. Pretty color looks different than photo. This polish is a great product so far. NO CHIPPING!! Dries super fast!!

this and mascara are the only makeup products I use. I love the color of this balance and brighten shade. I normally put it all over my face and then go back and contour. it eliminates having to buy blush plus I have rosacea and blush usually makes it worse. This works two ways as an all over makeup and a great contour using the number three method. I would definitely recommend this product.

I love this brand - like every product I have tried in this line on my sensitive skin, it is gently, amazingly silky, and easily absorbed. It does not give me rashes or cause me to break out. This eye cream is a lovely moisturizer, and my skin texture looks better, but my crows feet are exactly the same - they haven't decreased at all. I will update this review if things change in the next couple months.
summary: Silky moisturizer, but wrinkles are the same

reviewText: Good standby for someone who is allergic to everything.  Good under concealer.
summary: If you are allergic to everything, try this

reviewText: The color was just right for this as it meshed well with the user.  It is more for someone of a darker complexion and would not work as well with lighter skin.  The applicator was good, but digging too hard would make the makeup crumble so a light touch was needed.  One superior thing was the case design and latch.  Small enough to fit in a purse and not take up too much room, and the latch is a button.  Those cross tap latches have a habit of opening if they get jostled around.  The button took a solid pressure to pop open the case, and made it safe to toss this into a busy purse, bag or briefcase.  Recommended, if you think it fits your coloring.
summary: Fair price and nice case design for smooth applying make up.

reviewText: The last couple of months I have tried a few different eyebrow pencils and brushes. I was glad to have received the blonde color to try as I have red hair. The pencil was a lot darker than I was expecting, but it looks perfect. The pencil is easy to apply and glides on in natural looking strokes. I like that the other end of the pencil has a brush to help blend and perfect my brows. It helps my brows look darker while still looking natural. Definitely a fan of this product!
summary: I was glad to have received the blonde color to try as ...

reviewText: I just can't recommend Mario Badescu enough. I tell everyone I know that this product line is what keeps my skin amazing even as I head into my 40s. Some listen...others head for more expensive and (in my opinion) less effective products. This hand cream is divine. Absorbs immediately, smells fresh, and WORKS! My mom somehow discovered (I don't know how) that it also works well as a deodorant. It's true...another win from Mario Badescu.
summary: I just can't recommend Mario Badescu enough

reviewText: This is one of the best curling irons I've purchased! However, I wish I bought a smaller barrel, the 1' 1/4" barely gives me curls. I am still debating whether to buy a smaller barrel in addition or stick with the one I already got.
LOVE!!!! Pink with microglitter. Bought 2 bottles!
I bought this at the dermatology clinic and tried it for 8 weeks ......nothing changed nothing Im 55 and my neck looks the same, very disappointing! It is good as a moisturizer and thats it.
summary: It is good as a moisturizer and thats it

reviewText: I like the dark sparkly midnight blue color!

I've tried everything from premium designer stuff to the value stuff.  When it comes down to it, it's really just shaving soap.  This stuff is no different.  Proraso is a very good shaving product.  It doesn't have the variety of scents that other soaps/creams have, but for the price, it's a good low-frills product.  The soap is just hard enough to load my brush on it, but soft enough to get a really good load without too much effort.  It really whips up a great rich lather that is very slick.  It leaves my skin feeling hydrated and it works great with the Nivea aftershave balm.  The only gripe I have is the scent.  I don't particularly care for the soapy scent.  It's not bad, I just wouldn't wear it as a cologne.  Of course, smell is completely subjective.  Like most all soaps, the scent doesn't linger for more than a few minutes anyway.

Overall, the soap performs great.  There's plenty of product in there to last more than a couple of months.  It performs as well as TOBS, but 25% less expensive.

style: {'Size:': ' Gift set', 'Style:': ' 2. Glow Essentials Gift Set'}
reviewText:
This gift set contains a cleanser, serum, and night cream.

The cleanser is nice. Very gentle, and removes makeup without any irritation. The serum and night cream were a little too greasy for my skin, though. I really wanted to like them, but after using them at night my skin felt uncomfortable the next day, like a teen gushing oil. Not for me, overall.
Not needed with mascara

I loved the Japonesque eyeliner. It goes on smoothely, both for upper, lower, and waterline/tightlining purposes. Shade 01 is a bold, rich color -- it goes on evenly, and stays on all day. It sharpens nicely in a standard eyeliner sharpener, and looks gorgeous. Since I got it, I've been reaching for it over more expensive eyeliners: it goes beautifully with both warm (copper, bronze, brown) and cooler (greys, blacks, pearls) eyeshadows.
summary: Smooth, even application for all-day wear

reviewText: I tried this product that came without directions. The ingredients are all fine, but I didn't notice much change to my facial makeup. I applied my customary makeup products and then brushed this under my eyebrows, on my cheekbones and chin. I noticed subtle illumination. The tube contains an applicator brush and a push button on its end. After pushing the end button, a cream flows out onto the applicator brush and then you can sweep it on places you want to highlight.
summary: Subtle New Illuminator - almost invisible on fair skin

reviewText: Great summer color!  May be discontinued, but the bottle seemed fresh and has held up well...
Love the color and the quality of Essie.  Dark blue/navy is pretty in as a color this year so I plan on wearing this polish a lot.

Funny how, if you live long enough, everything seems to have a big comeback.  I used eyeliner as a teenager, then it fell out of fashion, and now it is back.  Will teased hair styles be next?

This eyeliner goes on very easy with the attached thin brush.  It felt a bit strange to put it on after so may years, but it was also fun.  The only problem is that when worn daily, you look like you're sick when you DON'T wear it.

I tried all the major brands for men and Baxters is definately a step above the rest. All product mfg have at least one of my favorites. This is the best buy for the three items. I do like all three products and they work well.

With airconditioning on all day, my skin gets very dry, especially areas under my eyes and cheek.  Apply little around those areas during the day, really minimise the dryness and constant cream application.  Hence avoid very simulating the oily area around my nose.  Economical , tiny amount is suffice.  Great for dry environments.
summary: Blessing in air conditioned living space.

reviewText: It's Okay.
This is great product and smells really nice. I use it every day as part of my cleaning regimen. I have fair skin and it really works for me.
summary: This is great product and smells really nice

reviewText: I'm usually an OPI girl, but I saw this color on a lady and loved it.  The color is great, but the Essie formula is a little watery (I needed 3 coats).  I'll probably be sticking to OPI

This is the first Baxter product I've used. It comes in a metal tube, similar to the type toothpaste used to come in. I use this in the shower and the tube caps tightly, preventing leakage. The product is a tan colored cream, with a lot of grit in it. You apply it to the face and gently massage away all the toxins and dead skin cells. It really works well. However, I've used Apricot scrubs, and pumice scrubs that work well too. I would go with Baxter's recommendation of using this product only once a week. That's all it is needed for my skin type. I do worry about getting the grit (corn meal and walnut shells) caught in my eye. The fragrance smells like wild cherries, and I'm not too keen on it; however it doesn't linger. It is expensive, but I may try some of the other Baxter products since my face deserves it!
summary: Used as directed, it works great!

reviewText:
I usually use a base of chap stick, lip liner, then lip stick. Afterwards, I put this gloss on as the finishing touch. I only apply everything once in the morning and it all lasts for most of the day as long as it doesn't wear off too much when eating.

I didn't care for this color that much but on top of my darker lipstick, it blended really well.

Great product.

Ive only been using this for about a week. I don't see any difference right now. My skin in sensitive and this didn't seem to bother my skin. I will continue to use it and will watch for improvement. If this happens to make my skin amazing, I will update my review. This is awfully expensive for it not to work more quickly.
Pretty, stylish color. I like Essie polish, but it does chip a little bit. Very good price.

While the container isn't very big, and much smaller than other nail polish, most colors don't get used enough before they go bad, so this works for us (although if you are a heavy user this might be a bigger deal).  Goes on nice and smooth, doesn't chip, and has a nice subtle coloring.
summary: most colors don't get used enough before they go bad, so this works for us (although if you ...

reviewText:
After washing and using a small amount of conditioner I applied about a pea-sized drop, which I spread between my palms onto my shoulder length curly hair. I stuck primarily to the lower two-thirds of my hair. My hope was that it would not weigh down my hair. It is finely textured but I have lots of it. Most curl serums and primers while keeping down frizz also weigh down the curls. Some dry hard and crunchy leaving hair looking good but feeling brittle and unpleasant.

So, my expectations were low but this product actually worked quite well. Granted I used just a small amount but it had no sticky feel on my hands, it smelled great and tamed the frizz leaving soft defined curls. And, since fragrance is subjective, so while I really liked it, others may not, but it did not linger at all. I could not smell it on my hair after air drying.

Because it is thin, it was easy to distribute throughout my hair. A small amount did a good job and I expect the tube to last for quite a while. A little pricey but performed well.

As I've gotten older, I've gotten acne along my throat and my upper chest. After a couple of days of use of this product, I found it to work miracles for me. On the first night I used it, it took all the redness away from my acne. On the second night, I noticed that all the acne were a lot smaller than before. On the third night, most of the acne were either drying out or starting to go away. I don't think I've ever been so impressed with an acne product as this. Not only did it not bleach my bed sheets, or clothes, but it also didn't dry out my skin like other products. There's a slight tingling burning sensation when you first apply that goes a way after a half hour or less. But it's well worth the pain. I've also started to use this product on my 12 year old daughter with some clear signs of success on her face so far. Count me in as continued customer for this product!
summary: but it also didn't dry out my skin like other products

reviewText:
This stuff is great and definitely helps clear up zits when used as directed. The earlier you detect a pimple forming and put this stuff on it, the more likely it will go away before coming to a head. It seems to even help reduce popped zits (I know I shouldn't, I just can't help it sometimes) in terms of swelling and redness. Even cystic acne goes away. I also use a thin layer on areas that I feel may break out (like freshly tweezed brows) and it is great for prevention.

I docked a star for the frustrating package it comes in. If the bottle was a little wider and shorter it would be perfect. When you get to the bottom of the bottle, you can't really reach it with a regular sized felt-tipped swab, for one thing, and for another usually the alcohol will completely dry out before you even get to the stuff so it dries into powder (I have gone through two bottles already). The last of the product is wasted unless you add a little of your own alcohol to the bottle and dig a cotton swab in there, covering your fingers in the residue at the top.
summary: Best thing I've found for fighting zits

reviewText: I love bulgari. It is a wonderful clean scent with just the right hint of manly spicy end notes. This starts off with the same citrus notes with a little heavier lime but as it transitions to the floral bouquets and spicy undertones it loses some of the depth and staying power. It quickly devolves into just hints of sweet citrus. 4 outa 4 people could not tell difference between it and Bv for first few minutes. After an hour 4 out of 4 could and preferred bulgari.  As a scent alone I'd give it  3.5 stars. For this price and this staying power and for being a total bulgari knock off id give it 0 if I could.

This is the first time I am trying out H20+ products. I must admit this lathers well and smells nice eucalyptus scent but the scent goes away once you wash off the shampoo. The shampoo is thick greenish color. It does clean hair rather nicely and keeps it manageable after drying the hair. The flip open shampoo dispenser works well. Having said, The cost factor weighs the overall rating down as for mere 360ml / US 12.2FL oz the price seem too steep and forces me to rate it with 3 stars, otherwise I would have given it "I like it" rating easily. On the plus side as couple of drops are enough to get a good smelling shampoo experience everyday so, this bottle might last couple of months for me.

This stuff is freaking incredible. I love all of LRP's products and their Effaclar line is my holy grail skincare. I have very fair skin and I'm prone to freckling which was cute when I was younger but now I just see it as sun damage. My derm recommended this to me back in the day but when I finally gave it a shot I was blown away. Yes, it's pretty pricey but it absorbs so quickly, is incredibly lightweight, leaves no white cast or greasy oil slick and has a very non-offensive smell, none of which can be said about most sunscreens I've tried in recent years. One bottle lasted me for ages and I will definitely repurchase once I decide to drag myself back out into the sun.
Top coat goes on nice, did not last one week.
I dispute the claim of being super shiny. These polishes are no more shiny than any other. Don't buy the hype. OPI I expect more of them.
As expected.

I like it.  This is my first time trying mineral make-up. This is a pretty light and soft color when you apply it.  Don't freak when you get in the mail.  It looks a lot darker than in the picture. You can adjust the color to as light or as dark as you want.  It comes in a really neat case that can be connected to other products in this line to create your own make-up kit.  The price is rather high but probably comparable to those brands you will find at a makeup counter in a Department Store.
My husband loves this and I enjoy it when he wears it. Pricey for our budget, but plan to keep indulging-it's worth it.
I was skeptical at first try, but this product does work, does smell good and does not damage the skin.

About 20 years ago (ugh feeling old), this was THE perfume/cologne that the cool kids wore. I decided recently that it still smells pretty darn good and wanted to go retro like the secret hipster that I am. Everyone in their 30s & 40s recognizes the scent even if they don't know exactly that it's CK1. My only complaint is that it can give me a headache. Worth it.

I'm very fond of this Baxter of California Hydro Salve Lip Balm.  The mojito scent is very light - a little lime, a little mint - nothing as heavy as most glosses aimed at women.  It is pleasant but doesn't tempt you to constantly lick your lips and try to eat the gloss.

It also provides a nice shine.  It's not a goopy gloss, nor overly shiny, and it lasts for quite awhile.  It won't quite last through a meal, but it comes close.

I did notice that Baxter of California Hydro Salve Lip Balm is marketed to men.  I'm not sure how it will do with that crowd.  The packaging isn't pink or anything, but it's in a squeeze tube instead of the more gender neutral chapstick style.  However, I like that the brand isn't being ridiculous and going overboard with trying to make the product seem manly.  I don't see any reason why a guy couldn't wear this product.

If you're looking for moisture without goopiness or color, Baxter of California Hydro Salve Lip Balm is a great choice.

I use Vichy for years (I grew up in Europe). I like this self tanner because:
- smells great,
- moisturizing,
- develops good color, sun kissed, not orange,
- doesn't clog pores.

It takes several hours to develop, and it is white cream so you can not see where you applied (just make sure you pay attention and still exfoliate before and wipe residue from eyebrows and hair line).
Other than that good stuff!
PS. I don't tan fro last 10 years and used low and high end self tanner. My all time fav is St Tropez mousse for instant color.
Since Vichy tube is small I use it only for the face and it lasts for ever.

I use this regularly to hide the thinning hair at my part.  My scalp is ghostly white, and this somehow bonds to the hair (not the scalp) and fill in the part.  I finish it with regular hairspray.  I am a femal and have been using this product for years, and through many haircolor changes,  I've also used the auburn and light brown.  This is better than the cheaper products.
It's just not for me.  I don't like the smell or how it feels.  I use a liquid makeup, then the mineral makeup, then use compact makeup to further set it.

If you are looking at this product because somehow the name implies that it's 'water' and therefore better than say, something with silicone? It's not. It has silicone.

I've used a ton of primers, from cheap to pricey. This one falls somewhere towards the lower end of wear for me. I have combination skin (older skin to boot but I use peels) and this primer made my foundation patchy after a few hours. I'm currently wearing Lancme Teinte Idole 24Hr over their Lancme-branded Pro base. The Lancme foundation slid around on the Vincent Longo base. I normally get about 12 hours of uninterrupted wear out of the Lancme otherwise.

It did feel nice going on, and it smelled pleasant. But wear? Didn't do anything good for me.
summary: Didn't work for my skin type

reviewText: Quality of the polish is fine however the color is much darker than the image suggest and does not really look green at all.
summary: Quality of the polish is fine however the color is much darker than the image ...

reviewText:
I love these products. You polish your nail and in less than 10 minutes you are out the door!
This color Cream Puff is the perfect color for any type of French. It is a good color to keep
around for weddings, black tie affairs, special occasions etc.... I like the simple clean on my
nails for important events.

LOVED this nail polish! Such a pretty purple/grey color. Not shimmery at all and looks awesome on my nails. Is not too thin and streaky but is not too thick either. I love Essie colors, especially purple and will continue buying them!
This is THE most beautiful blue polish I've every owned! Perfect for summer time (or any season!).
Love La Roche-Posay and this is a great body lotion. Moisturizes well but doesn't leave ur skin feeling oily. There is a very mild scent which I actually like.
This is my new signature Fall polish!! Love this color! It looks black, but in the light there is some shiny wine undertones
Knockout Pout is more of a pepto bismol pink, which is exactly what I was looking for. But that doesn't come across in the pictures.

While this doesn't go on easy for me, it takes a while to make sure the white layer is completely rubbed in, it does have a nice texture to it. What I really love is the scent! This is the first sunscreen I've tried that does not smell like sunscreen and in fact has a very pleasant scent to it. I think the price at $49 is too high for what you get though.
summary: While this doesn't go on easy for me

reviewText:
I would hate to have to live without this product. I have fine, straight hair. I get it colored and cut at a salon which uses and sells Bumble and Bumble. As soon as I can, I wash that stuff out. It feels sticky in my hair and gives it no shine at all. If you want softness and incredible shininess, this is the answer.

Must admit that I use it in combination with ' it's a 10"  miracle leave-in product. Because my shoulder length hair tangles easily in the shower, I apply a few drops of "it's a 10" after shampooing and rinsing. Then I comb it through, eliminating all the tangles. Out of the shower I dry it slightly, and then apply a teaspoon of Super Skinny Serum, starting with the ends. The result is hair which holds its shape very well and shines brilliantly.

Love, love, love this color!  Essie is always great!  The bottle was actually a little bigger than I expected.  I got a lot of nail polish for my money.  Will be buying Essie products again and again!

Smells great and the bottle is quite sharp looking. It's a slightly spicy and fairly masculine fragrance. I prefer the way it smells on my husband versus straight from the bottle. Like many colognes, the fragrance of this smells much better on clothing or on someone, compared to just taking a whiff of it from the bottle. The longer it's out of the bottle, the better it smells. And it's a long lasting fragrance. I can still smell it faintly on clothing days later when I'm doing laundry. Wonderful cologne!

I'm SO glad I decided to try this toothpaste! Not only does it work, but it's so incredibly gentle! I seem to have become sensitive to whitening products, be it toothpaste or otherwise. They all either leave my gums raw, or cause tooth sensitivity. Not so with this toothpaste!
My teeth have become blinding white since using. My dentist even asked me what I was using because the difference was so drastic (as I had hoped it would be!).
I drink red wine, coffee, and I'm an ex-smoker. My teeth were getting a bit yellower as I neared 30 but they are finally white again and they are staying white!

The mint isn't too strong and doesn't make my eyes water either. Most toothpastes make my mouth feel like it's on fire, but this toothpaste does not.

My teeth look and feel great. This toothpaste gives my teeth that squeaky clean feeling and my dentist said my enamel doesn't look like it's taking a beating either which is a plus.

I couldn't recommend this toothpaste more. Skip the popular name brands and try this out. Yes, its more expensive, but a tube lasts me quite a long time and IT WORKS! The only downside is it can leave your toothbrush feeling hard after drying. This isn't too big of a deal for me personally, its just an annoying aspect. You also have to rinse with this toothpaste a bit. If you try it youll see why and what I mean. It leaves a milky white look behind even once you spit it out.

I went a period without repurchasing when I needed to because my husband wanted to try charcoal. It did nothing except cause gum pain. Over the course of this time my teeth started to dull but after reordering this and using it just once, my teeth were already whiter again. Its been a few weeks and my teeth are blinding white again.

This is my HG toothpaste and I recommend it to all my friends and family as well. It's pretty amazing stuff.

This sunscreen is non-greasy, unscented, and easy to apply. Its the perfect consistency; not too thick and not too watery. Its described as very water resistant and thats the truth. Its almost waterproof and getting it off your hands after applying it takes some doing. Ive worn it swimming and cycling and its held up excellent. Its expensive for a sunscreen but a little goes a long way. However, due to the price I mainly use it on my face and use cheaper stuff on my body. The bottom line is that it does everything its supposed to do and it does it very well.

I really should have gone to the store rather than trusting how colors would translate from online to in person.  Since I'm a fan of butter London, it seemed like a safe gamble.  Wow was I wrong.  The color Dahling (such a fun name, like all their colors) looks *nothing* like the photo.  I thought it was going to be a delicious medium sherberty pink and it's actually rather dowdy,  a matronly mauvey pink.  Sad.
summary: Try to check colors in the store first

reviewText: works pretty well on waterpoof mascara I like that it doesnt leave my eyes feeling oily or gross.

I have serious dry skin during the winter --- to the point of eczema. So of course when I saw a facial moisturizer up on Amazon Vine I HAD to snatch it up!

What I didn't know was that this product was geared towards men. Oops. Oh well, a facial moisturizer is a facial moisturizer, right?!?

This product does a fairly well job at keeping my face moisturized and preventing the dry patches from bothering me like they normally do. It's too early to say how long this will last as my skin seems to get use to certain products faster than others but as of now, I'm really loving how soft this product makes my skin!

If you're looking for a great moisturizer I would highly suggest this one. Plus for the price, it's a great deal. This tube is HUGE!
summary: Wasn't aware this was for men when I ordered it...

reviewText:
I tend to stick with a simple organic olive oil soap bar for my daily shower. But last night I showered with Rituals of Ayurveda Indian rose and sweet almond oil foaming shower gel after a long hot day, and it was the most enjoyable, relaxing and reviving shower ever.  This shower gel creates an ultra thick, white foam like Ive never experienced.  I try to avoid sulfates and don't generally go for foaming products, but this foaming gel smells divine and feels so silky smooth and luxurious slathered all over Ill gladly make an exception. This gel cleans beautifully and is comforting to my sensitive dry skin. It does make the bottoms of my feet a bit slippery, so some may want to avoid the feet or use a nonslip tub mat.

My skin feels calm, soft and more moisturized than usual after using this gel and still felt amazing by the next morning. Im not a fan of strong fragrance, but this has a scent thats delicate and light. The scent lingers lightly on my skin and makes my skin smell so good but its subtle.  The fragrance doesnt trigger my allergies like some products, and this gel doesnt irritate or dry my sensitive skin. This gel comes in a shiny red container that looks so pretty and has a high end look that suits the premiere quality of the product. Mine arrived with a clear cap and functions perfectly.  This isn't a natural product, but I like that it doesnt contain parabens. This shower gel feels decadent, refreshing and uplifting. I absolutely love it. Made in Germany.

PS: Im attaching a photo of the ingredients for this particular shower gel. A good photo is hard to get as the shine of the container is brilliant, but hope those who need to check ingredients can see it.
summary: Ritual Of Ayurveda Indian Rose & Sweet Almond Oil Gel Makes Thick Foam- Decadent & Relaxing With A Lovely Delicate Scent

reviewText:
It is always difficult to review colognes and aftershaves as scent is a very subjective thing, and trying to describe it with words is like trying to describe a color.  What I can say about this Burberry Brit Splash is it has a very pleasant, light scent that is not overpowering like so many fragrances people often wear these days.  I agree with another reviewer who referred to it as clean-smelling, but this is not the kind of scent you might find on bath soap or deodorant.  It is much more refined than that. This one is intimate and intended to be smelled by someone nearby.  It is the ideal scent for a man to wear while out on the town with his favorite lady and for more romantic moments.  My wife seemed to really like the scent after I sprayed some on.

There was no price listed for this product at the time I received it for review, so I cannot comment about cost and value.  What I can say is the bottle I received was quite generous in size (almost 14 ounces), much larger than I expected, and should last a very long time.  It has an atomizer on the top of he bottle, which allows for very light application.  The bottle is attractive and looks just fine sitting on the edge of my sink.
summary: light, pleasant, intimate scent that is not overpowering

reviewText:
